author: inktrap

comments.content: Hm, very close. I see they have double story as an alternate character, but the dot on 'i' seems to be only diamond shaped. Could it be something very similar to Fedra?

You can try Fedra Sans Screen to get the square dot on |i|:  
 [https://www.typotheque.com/fonts/fedra\_sans\_screen](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172413/https:/www.typotheque.com/fonts/fedra_sans_screen "https://www.typotheque.com/fonts/fedra\_sans\_screen")

Oh, I missed that one.  
Well, that's it then.
So much for credit where credit is due....
Sorry, I wasn't looking. Edited now :-)
